I have the exact same problem as RW-EXplosion, the installation instigates the program & it is NOT registered and asks me to do so. In the download file is the one program, no Crack, Keygen, Text file, nothing else at all ... so could pirate0610 or somebody who has apparently got this working successfully, explain what we are doing wrong ?!?

OK, got it now, my AV software, Vipre, had deleted the crack file without me even knowing !!! RW-EXplosion, there should be 2 files in the download folder, see if your AV has done the same. Run the Install & then the crack, which will overwrite the original ...

This odd Russian keygen works perfectly.  It even has a site: http://www.nemo-crack.ru/ The reason many of you are not receiving it is because you have neglected to turn off one of your security software packages and its "eaten" during download.  Turn off Norton 360 or whatever you use for an hour.  Disable Zemana AntiLogger.  If you have Emsisoft AntiMalware kill that AND the File-Guard feature using ANVIR Free Task Manager.  Don't forget to exit your Iobit anti-malware products.  Then download.  Yes, Driver Reviver starts scanning automatically.  Just stay with it and hit "stop scan" when it is preparing.  Apply the crack.  Go back to the Driver Program and look for 'Active' in red letters.  Begin the scan.  
Once you re-enable your your Security arsenal, it will most likely quarantine the keygen and the program will no longer work.  But -big deal - you've already updated your drivers.  If you check your driver monthly,  just repeat the process.
